metadata.name: Metawarz Rebel - We March
metadata.description:
Metawarz Shooter Collection is a one-of-a-kind collection of NFTs that signify being among the early supporters of Metawarz game. The Elite Membership NFT of Metawarz ecosystem. Passively grow your portfolios by staking Elite Membership NFTs and earn $LEGION and $WARZ tokens. Staking will be made available when the game is in the pre-production phase, once the Metawarz Decentralized application is deployed. 

Metawarz Shooter is an immersive blockchain-based multiplayer first-person shooter video game. Following the nuclear armageddon in the year 2381, two factions emerged: (1) the Ground Zero Territory controlled by rebels, and (2) the Realm Territory governed by One-Percenters comprised of bureaucrats and the Elite Upper class. These factions are locked in a battle for resources, political dominance, and territorial takeover.
